Summary: Login & Authentication - Verify login, session & tokens
Trigger for Regression: After changes in login or auth module
Test Description: Verify login with valid and invalid credentials, session management, and token validation
Expected Result: Login and session functionality works without regression

Summary: Real-Time Messaging - Verify send/receive and delivery status
Trigger for Regression: After any changes to chat APIs or socket implementation
Test Description: Check message send/receive between users and message delivery status
Expected Result: Messages sent and received instantly with correct status indicators

Summary: Group Chat Module - Verify group messaging visibility
Trigger for Regression: After group or participant management updates
Test Description: Create group, send message, verify visibility for all participants
Expected Result: Messages visible to all participants without delay

Summary: File Sharing - Verify upload/download and integrity
Trigger for Regression: After file upload/download or storage API changes
Test Description: Send image, video, and document files; verify successful transfer
Expected Result: Files shared and downloaded correctly without corruption

Summary: Chat History Persistence - Verify logs after refresh/login
Trigger for Regression: After database schema or session management updates
Test Description: Check message logs after refresh and re-login

Summary: Notifications - Verify offline and push notifications
Trigger for Regression: After push notification or backend service update
Test Description: Send message when user offline and verify notification received

Summary: Server Downtime Handling - Verify error handling & retries
Trigger for Regression: After infrastructure or error handling code updates
Test Description: Simulate network loss, try sending messages
Expected Result: App displays meaningful error and retries automatically

Summary: Performance under Load - Verify behavior under 1000+ users
Data Security and Encryption - Verify encryption in transit & at rest
Trigger for Regression: After security patch or encryption logic update
Test Description: Inspect data packets and stored messages
Expected Result: All messages encrypted in transit and at rest

Summary: End-to-End Regression Test - Full cycle verification
Test Description: Perform login, chat, logout flow with multiple users
Expected Result: System functions correctly across all modules
